name: Chicken fajita
description: Tender grilled chicken served sizzling with sautéed bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes. Comes with rice, beans, lettuce, sour cream, shredded cheese, pico de gallo, an extra tomato slice, and your choice of three flour or corn tortillas

name: Steak fajita
description: Tender grilled steak served sizzling with sautéed bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes. Comes with rice, beans, lettuce, sour cream, shredded cheese, pico de gallo, an extra tomato slice, and your choice of three flour or corn tortillas

name: Mixed fajita
description: Tender grilled steak and chicken served sizzling with sautéed bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes. Comes with rice, beans, lettuce, sour cream, shredded cheese, pico de gallo, an extra tomato slice, and your choice of three flour or corn tortillas

name: Shrimp fajita
description: Tender grilled shrimp served sizzling with sautéed bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes. Comes with rice, beans, lettuce, sour cream, shredded cheese, pico de gallo, an extra tomato slice, and your choice of three flour or corn tortillas

name: Pork fajita
description: Tender grilled pork served sizzling with sautéed bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes. Comes with rice, beans, lettuce, sour cream, shredded cheese, pico de gallo, an extra tomato slice, and your choice of three flour or corn tortillas

name: Fajita Texana
description: Tender grilled steak, chicken, and shrimp served sizzling with sautéed bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes. Comes with rice, beans, lettuce, sour cream, shredded cheese, pico de gallo, an extra tomato slice, and your choice of three flour or corn tortillas

name: Fajita Hawaiana
description: Tender grilled steak, chicken, and shrimp and pineapple served sizzling with sautéed bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes. Comes with rice, beans, lettuce, sour cream, shredded cheese, pico de gallo, an extra tomato slice, and your choice of three flour or corn tortillas
